description.raw:
I'm not sure when it happened, but the habitat mesh has slightly changed in a way that the wall collisions don't fit as nicely anymore. This is mainly an issue for the wall which has the leak, so I just fixed that one. 

Now you can see the collision nicely matching the visual and the leak sticking out. The screenshot is harder to understand than actually looking at the mesh though...

![leakcollision.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/1850412866-leakcollision.png)
